Package io.github.belgif.rest.problem.api

Interface FluentRetryAfterProblem<SELF extends Problem & RetryAfter & FluentRetryAfterProblem<SELF>>

Type Parameters:
SELF - the concrete RetryAfter Problem self-type
All Superinterfaces:
FluentProblem<SELF>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceUnavailableProblem, TooManyFailedRequestsProblem, TooManyRequestsProblem
public interface FluentRetryAfterProblem<SELF extends Problem & RetryAfter & FluentRetryAfterProblem<SELF>> extends FluentProblem<SELF>
Provides default methods with fluent RetryAfter problem properties (retryAfter, retryAfterSec).
